name: Designation of area
text: [§431:21-107]  Designation of area.  After consultation with representatives of the United States Geological Survey, the state department of defense, and the county in which the area is located, the commissioner shall designate the geographical area eligible for coverage through the association.  Those properties in the designated area that meet the standards set forth in the plan of operation shall be provided insurance through the association. [L 1991, c 284, pt of §2]
